fields.name: duplicate_settings
fields.description: (if a user posts a duplicate comment within this amount of time)/(they are locked out for this amount of time)

fields.name: post_rate_settings
fields.description: (if a user posts more than this many comments)/(in this time period)/(they're locked out for this amount of time)

fields.name: combined_throttle_rate
fields.description: the maximum number of requests per unit of time
